reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and true to size, with a perfect length that reaches above the ankles. The fabric quality receives positive feedback, with one customer noting its flowy nature, while another mentions it's suitable for cooler months. They appreciate its flattering design, with one highlighting its a-line cut and another noting its empire waist placement, and find it well-made and beautiful in color. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfy, flattering, I’m in love.
items.body: I LOVE this dress! The color is beautiful and exactly as pictured. The fabric is so flowy and soft. I wore it to a wedding and my friends kept touching it and commenting on how soft it was. The material was thinner than I was expecting. It wasn’t much of a problem because it wasn’t see through, but it was cold outside and I could really feel the wind blowing through the dress. I am only 5’4” (180 lbs) and the length was great. It was very comfortable. I also LOVE that it doesn’t wrinkly at all! I literally crumpled it up in my suitcase and it came out perfect! I might need to buy it in more colors. Read more
items.author: Oneplantgreenhouse

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fall/Winter Dress for Wedding Guest
items.body: I have a fall mountain wedding to attend, so I wanted long sleeves, and velvet fabric; this dress fit my need. I am 5’5”, 138lbs and the medium fit perfectly! The fabric is somewhat heavy, hangs nicely and not clingy, the dress length is just above my ankles, which I really like (no stepping on a floor length dress!), and the quality of the fabric and construction are perfect (no hanging threads, no stitching unraveling, finished seams). The dress has a deep v-neck, but there is an elastic loop and button sewn in so it’s the perfect V-neck for a special occasion. It is so very comfortable with the empire waist hitting at the right spot. I have a little tummy, but it doesn’t show in the perfect cut of the dress. I bought the caramel color which is deep and rich, just right for fall or winter. Read more
items.author: NorCal Ellen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress!
items.body: This color is gorgeous! The photo doesn’t do it justice! I love it!!! I’m 5’1 & size 10-12 it fits great! I’m slightly self conscious of my arms but the flowy sleeves are flattering along with the placement of the waist elastic. The material feels like great quality, a good weight to it, the length is perfect for me and it feels like it wouldn’t wrinkle! I’m wearing this for engagement photos and definitely perfect for a holiday party too! Read more
items.author: Kemptont

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars wrong color
items.body: I would have given 5 stars,. But they sent the wrong color. I ordered the blue but received the green. Dress is beautiful and fits wonderful. But I am dissapointed that it is the wrong color Read more
items.author: LINDA EDWARDS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and comfortable
items.body: Very comfortable and flattering dress. True to size and the length of the size L was still perfect for me at 5”4. Classy and versatile. Purchased for a formal winter wedding. Would recommend! Read more
items.author: Sarah Ferrell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A buy for the holidays
items.body: Great dress. Fits according to size measurements. Looks expensive, great value for price. The color is rich and great for this winter season. Read more
items.author: Laura

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Dress
items.body: This dress is so comfortable, vibrant and beautiful. It was perfect for my maternity shoot. It’s so cute I’ll wear it even when I’m no longer pregnant. I got a lot of complaints on it. Read more
items.author: Kylie Domenech

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for large busts
items.body: The fabric is nice and thick. It’s very long. I bet a shorter person would have to get it hemmed. The V in the front has a button with an elastic loop that was completely stretched. It should have just been sewn here. This dress looked okay of if I pulled the waist down to where it should be. But if I move at all the waist rides up into bust territory as shown in photo. I’m 36G/ 5’9”/240 lbs Read more
items.author: MM

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: B#purple, B#black, B#lake Blue, B#red, B#dark Olive, B#navy Blue, B#burgundy, B#caramel, B#emerald Green, B#coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
